place_of_publication.publication_title: in A. P. de Candolle and A. L. P. P. de Candolle, Prodr.

taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family asteraceae;tribe heliantheae;subtribe chaenactidinae;genus venegasia;species carpesioides

bio:treatment.description: Leaf blades mostly 3–12+ × 2–10+ cm. Ray laminae 15–30 mm. Disc corollas 5–6 mm. Cypselae 2–3 mm. 2n = 38.
Usually in shade in canyons and along streams;
